product_name: blurr Grace Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Climbing may take you to new heights, but the blurr Grace capris stay grounded in the natural softness of organic cotton and a low-key vibe that looks great on and off the rock. Organic cotton blended with nylon and a touch of spandex offers a fabric with soft, natural texture and comfortable stretch. Gusseted crotch and articulated knees ensure complete range of motion. Smooth waistband and minimal pockets are designed to accommodate harnesses. Closeout.
short_description: Climbing may take you to new heights, but the blurr Grace capris stay grounded in the natural softness of organic cotton and a low-key vibe that looks great on and off the rock.
